channel.title: Tormented demons or corp arent dropping items
channel.description: I need help, i've added drops for tormented demons AND Corp beast in .cfg and.tsm and they still dont drop claws or divines.

item.title: Tormented demons or corp arent dropping items
item.dc:creator: @thebigr5 thebigr5
item.description:
@thebigr5 wrote:

I had the same problem because my claws and spirit shields were not listed as rare drops. They are set on 70 % and then under the original drop one, you have to make a second line which is the rare drop…
Here is an example of the code i have -

#Tormented Demon
8349:70 892:42 1371:1 1373:1 1113:1 1319:1 995:20000
14484:1

it used to be this

#Tormented Demon
8349:70 892:42 1371:1 1373:1 1113:1 1319:1 995:20000 14484: 1

I put the claws into the rare drop sectiona and finnaly one of my players got d claws.
(dont put rarity on 1, it drops everytime then)

Read full topic
